Value.label: Basic Set Level
Value.Help: Defines the level in the Basic Set event sent to group 2 when the sensor is triggered. Default is 99 (full brightness for a Z-Wave dimmer). 0 disables.

Value.label: Lux On Trigger
Value.Help: Lux level to trigger when a ON command is sent out. 0 will clear the value.

Value.label: Lux Off Trigger
Value.Help: Lux level to trigger when an OFF command is sent out. 0 will clear the value.

Value.label: Lux Timer Off Trigger
Value.Help: Set Lux timer trigger to send an OFF command. 0 will clear the value.

Value.label: Auto Report Time
Value.Help: Sets the auto report time interval. 0 disables.

Value.label: Auto Report Lux
Value.Help: Sets the auto report Lux interval. 0 disabled.
